item.title: Create a new user in Ubuntu from terminal
item.description: In order to create a new user in a Linux Ubuntu distribution from terminal, you have to use this command. sudo adduser username After this, the system will ask you some parameters included the password. [23:43:24] ubuntu|zoar:~$ sudo adduser yvoictra Adding user `yvoictra' ... Adding new group`yvoictra' (1001) … Adding new user `yvoictra' (1001) with group`yvoictra' … Creating home directory `/home/yvoictra' ... Copying files from`/etc/skel' … New password: Retype new password: passwd: password updated successfully Changing the user information for yvoictra Enter the new value, or press ENTER for the default Full Name []: Yvoictra Room Number []: Work Phone []: Home Phone []: Other []: Is the information correct?
